short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlock your Chromebook's potential with a powerful keyboard launcher!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌟 𝗪𝗛𝗔𝗧'𝗦 𝗡𝗘𝗪
- Added Side-panel support.
- Added message notifying users of deprecation.

🗝️ 𝗨𝗡𝗟𝗢𝗖𝗞 𝗬𝗢𝗨𝗥 𝗞𝗘𝗬𝗕𝗢𝗔𝗥𝗗 ⌨️
- Missing PowerToys & Alfred on ChromeOS? CrosKeys expands Search to include more timesaving commands. 
- Keep your hands on the keyboard by using any text field as a launching pad.
- CrosKeys integrates with Google Workspace, Notion, Figma, and more!
- You don’t need Android or Web specific tools. CrosKeys works everywhere!*

🔤 𝗧𝗘𝗫𝗧 𝗙𝗢𝗥𝗠𝗔𝗧𝗧𝗜𝗡𝗚 & 𝗙𝗢𝗡𝗧𝗦
- Change selected text to UPPERCASE, lowercase, and other formatting options.
- Pro/Unlimited users get full access to Unicode fonts, allowing you to type in special fonts anywhere.
- This includes 𝐼𝑡𝑎𝑙𝑖𝑐𝑠, 𝙼𝚘𝚗𝚘𝚜𝚙𝚊𝚌𝚎, 𝐁𝐨𝐥𝐝, and more!
-  Paste some randomly generated Lorem Ipsum text wherever you need it! 

👍🏿 𝗨𝗡𝗜𝗖𝗢𝗗𝗘 𝗦𝗬𝗠𝗕𝗢𝗟𝗦 & 𝗘𝗠𝗢𝗝𝗜𝗦
- Tired of memorizing codes for characters? Access Unicode symbols with a quick command! 
- Search a massive library of Unicode emojis! 
- (╯°益°)╯彡┻━┻ Don't flip the table, Kaomojis are here too! 
- Match your emojis to your skin color in the Options page! 
- No more fighting with different emoji plugins, CrosKeys’ emojis work everywhere! 

✂️ 𝗧𝗘𝗫𝗧 𝗘𝗫𝗣𝗔𝗡𝗦𝗜𝗢𝗡
- Tired of typing the same thing over and over? Want to avoid typos? Use text expansion! 
- Unlike Play Store apps or other extensions, CrosKeys works in both the Web and Android environments. And coming soon…Linux support! 
- Save up to 5 snippets of text for later, then recall them!
- CrosKeys Pro members, get unlimited snippets for quick typing anywhere! 

📋 𝗖𝗟𝗜𝗣𝗕𝗢𝗔𝗥𝗗 𝗠𝗔𝗡𝗔𝗚𝗘𝗥
- Press ALT + \ to access the CrosKeys Clipboard window. 
- Expand the Chrome OS Clipboard history with up to 20 items!
- Highlight tabs and add them to the CrosKeys Clipboard with a click! 
- Drop text, images, and files into the Clipboard Manager to save for later!
- Drag from the Clipboard Manager to send files between the Android, Linux, and Chrome Environments! 
- Sequentially paste by pressing Shift + Enter.
- Search and share your Clipboard easily! 
- CrosKeys Pro members can save thousands of entries to their history!

📝 𝗤𝗨𝗜𝗖𝗞𝗡𝗢𝗧𝗘𝗦
- Jot down your thoughts for later from the Candidate Window!
- Save up to 5 notes as a free user!
- Share your notes with others, to Android apps on your machine, or download them as plain text files!
- CrosKeys Pro members can save unlimited QuickNotes!

🔗 𝗤𝗨𝗜𝗖𝗞𝗟𝗜𝗡𝗞𝗦
- Keep your most important sites just a few clicks away!
- Choose to open them in Tabs or Windows depending on your use-case. 
- Enter up to 5 links as a free user and an unlimited amount as a CrosKeys Pro member!
- Become a true power-user by launching Deep-Links from any text-field!

🦾 𝗖𝗥𝗢𝗦𝗞𝗘𝗬𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢
Access pro features for $14.99 if you only need access to expanded Text Snippets, QuickNotes, QuickLinks, and up to 500 Clipboard History items.

- Unlimited Text Snippets, QuickNotes, QuickLinks, and up to 9999 Clipboard history entries!

🔒 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗬 𝗣𝗥𝗜𝗩𝗔𝗧𝗘 & 𝗦𝗘𝗖𝗨𝗥𝗘
- We use the latest, most secure extension technologies from Google to accomplish what we do. Manifest Version 3 keeps you safe from harmful extensions and we embrace it wholeheartedly. 

- Chrome extension keyboards like CrosKeys cannot log information typed in a password field, keeping you secure!

- Still worried? Don’t be! Just turn off CrosKeys with a simple shortcut:  “CTRL + Space.” When you need it again, turn it back on with the same keys!

- CrosKeys Pro payments are handled by Stripe. This system is used and trusted by Google, Amazon, Zoom, and others.

- CrosKeys Pro sign-ups are handled through ExtensionPay. This library is open-source, allowing you to read and verify every line of code contained within it.

*Linux developer mode not yet supported. 
**https://developers.google.com/apps-script/guides/services/quotas

𝗔𝗗𝗗𝗜𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡𝗔𝗟 𝗜𝗡𝗙𝗢𝗥𝗠𝗔𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡
- Some CrosKeys Pro features require an internet connection. 
- We developed CrosKeys for Chrome OS and it will not work on Windows, Mac OS, or Linux. 

https://www.crosexperts.com

https://www.crosexperts.com/privacy-policy

For full patch notes and support, visit us on our subreddit:
https://www.reddit.com/r/CrosExperts/
